subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh guard Ashton Gibbs, U.C.L.A. guard Malcolm Lee and Maryland center Jordan Williams declared for the N.B.A. draft but said they would not hire agents.
snippet: Pittsburgh guard Ashton Gibbs, U.C.L.A. guard Malcolm Lee and Maryland center Jordan Williams declared for the N.B.A. draft but said they would not hire agents.
